front.title: Encapsulation Services Protocol Service Type for L2TP

abstract.t: The Layer Two Tunneling Protocol (L2TP) [RFC2661] provides a standard method for tunneling PPP [RFC1661] packets. In accordance with the L2TP Service Type specification [L2TPST], this document provides a solution for transporting Encapsulation Services Protocol (ESP) [ESP] over L2TP. It uses [L2TPDS] for providing DS support to the L2TP control and ESP packets.
